## \_startLitClient

Starts Lit Client in background. should be run upon starting of project.

### Parameters

*   `window` **[Window][3]** the window of the project, to which it attaches
    a litNodeClient

[1]: #_startlitclient

[2]: #parameters

[3]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Window
